title: Define Quantum Simulator Architecture
description: Develop a high-level design for the quantum computing simulator.

title: Design User Interface for Quantum Simulator
description: Create wireframes and mockups of the user interface for interacting with the quantum simulator.

title: Develop Backend for Quantum Simulator
description: Build the backend components to handle quantum operations and data processing.

title: Implement Quantum Algorithm Libraries
description: Add common quantum algorithms for users to test and optimize.

title: Develop Test Cases for Quantum Algorithms
description: Create test cases to ensure the correctness and performance of implemented quantum algorithms.

title: Review and Optimize Existing Quantum Algorithms
description: Investigate the literature for optimizations of existing quantum algorithms and implement them.

title: Document Quantum Simulator Functionality and Usage
description: Write clear and concise documentation for users to understand the quantum simulator's features and how to use it.
dependencies: Design User Interface for Quantum Simulator

title: Perform Security Audit on Quantum Simulator
description: Review the quantum simulator's code and architecture to identify and address potential security vulnerabilities.
